channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Quadric rides the shift from cloud AI to on-device inference — and it’s paying off
item.description: Quadric aims to help companies and governments build programmable on-device AI chips that can run fast-changing models locally.

item.title: Not to be outdone by OpenAI, Apple is reportedly developing an AI wearable
item.description: Should this wearable materialize, it could be released as early as 2027, according to a report on the device.

item.title: Former Google trio is building an interactive AI-powered learning app for kids
item.description: Big tech companies and upcoming startups want to use generative AI to build software and hardware for kids. A lot of those experiences are limited to ...

item.title: Snapchat gives parents new insights into teens’ screen time and friends
item.description: With these new features, Snap is likely looking to appease regulators and parents over concerns about safety and screen time on its platform.

item.title: Tiger Global, Microsoft to fully exit Walmart-backed PhonePe via its IPO
item.description: Tiger Global and Microsoft are offering up their full stakes in the company, while Walmart is choosing to retain its majority stake, and selling up to...

item.title: Irony alert: Hallucinated citations found in papers from NeurIPS, the prestigious AI conference
item.description: Research from startup GPTZero points to the impossible problem prestigious conferences face in the age of AI slop.

item.title: Apps for boycotting American products surge to the top of the Danish App Store
item.description: The boost in downloads comes as Danish consumers have been organizing a grassroots boycott of American-made products, which also included canceling th...

item.title: $100 Off Shark Promo Code | This January
item.description: Shark makes some seriously powerful vacuums, from handheld vacs to steam mops. Don’t miss $100 off, 10% off, and more limited-time coupons from WIRED.

item.title: What Type of Mattress Is Right for You? (2026)
item.description: Here’s how to pick the best mattress for your sleep needs, straight from a professional mattress tester.

item.title: What We Know About the Winter Storm About to Hit the US—and What We Don’t
item.description: A huge portion of the United States is going to be hit with snow or freezing rain this weekend. Exactly where, what, and how much remains uncertain.
